description:
Citlali is a shielder and a support, primarily played in in teams triggering melt. Using her Elemental Skill, Citlali provides your active character with a shield that scales with Elemental mastery and enters a Nightsoul blessing state. 
Citlali's ascension 1 passive allows her to shred enemies' Pyro and Hydro resistance when Melt or Freeze is triggered,  making her an amazing support for Pyro characters like Mavuika, Yoimiya, Arlecchino or Gaming.
title: Citlali | Playstyle
